text: aap kahiyeh kya tumhaare saajhiyon mein koee sammaarg darshaata hai? (yadi nahin,)to kya jo sammaarg darshaata ho, vah adhik yogy hai ki usaka anupaalan kiya jaaye athava vah, jo svayan sammaarg par na ho, parantu ye ki use sammaarg darsha diya jaaye? to tumhen kya ho gaya hai? tum kaisa nirnay kar rahe ho
